      • checkOdd

        public int checkOdd()
        This is a helper function for isPalindromePossible method. It uses count array to check array indexes of each letter in the alphabet to count recurrence of the odd number of letters.
        Returns:
        odd numbered letters

      • isPalindromePossible

        public boolean isPalindromePossible​(java.lang.String password1)
        This recursive method increments every character's index by one and checks whether an odd numbered characters being less than 1.
        Parameters:
        password1 -
        Returns:
        true if odd numbered letters is less than 1, if it is more than 1 than it returns false and prints the error message
